wikipedia_page.main: Rear-Admiral Francis Alexander Waddilove Buller, DSO, RN (1879 – 14 July 1943) was a flag officer in the British Royal Navy.

response: *Francis Alexander Waddilove Buller, British Royal Navy officer

* Rear Admiral Francis Alexander Waddilove Buller  (born 1879) who married, in 1916, Mary Caroline, daughter of Stephen Hammick.Fox-Davies, Armorial Families, 1929, p. 255 ; National Archives, ADM 196/44/465
